snippet: The farmers say that between 1981 and 1997, the Agriculture Department ignored their complaints about local officials who unfairly denied them farm loans and other aid.
lead_paragraph: The farmers say that between 1981 and 1997, the Agriculture Department ignored their complaints about local officials who unfairly denied them farm loans and other aid.

headline.main: Judge Signs Off on Settlement for Black Farmers
headline.print_headline: Judge Signs Off on Settlement for Black Farmers
headline.seo: Judge Signs Off on Settlement for Black Farmers
